Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds great value to us at $12000, reflecting its quality, functionality, and uniqueness. We believe it could be a perfect fit for you, enhancing your experience and fulfilling your requirements. Please consider this offer and let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
